LanguageData.VPE_Apparel_EltexMask.label: arcane mask
LanguageData.VPE_Apparel_EltexMask.description: An artistically impressive mask emanating arcane energy. Hides the face of the wearer but provides little physical protection. Its special materials enhance the wearer's magical aptitude and dissipate arcane load.
LanguageData.VPE_Apparel_EltexCape.label: arcane cape
LanguageData.VPE_Apparel_EltexCape.description: A long cape of mystical design. It hangs over one side of the torso. Its special materials enhance the wearer's magical aptitude and dissipate arcane load.
LanguageData.Apparel_PsyfocusHelmet.label: arcanium helmet
LanguageData.Apparel_PsyfocusHelmet.description: A lightweight helmet designed for magical focusing. While it provides little physical protection, its special materials enhance the wearer's magical aptitude and dissipate arcane load.
LanguageData.Apparel_EltexSkullcap.label: arcanium skullcap
LanguageData.Apparel_EltexSkullcap.description: A tight skullcap designed for magical focusing. It provides no physical protection, but its special materials enhance the wearer's magical aptitude and dissipate arcane load.
LanguageData.Apparel_PsyfocusShirt.label: arcanium shirt
LanguageData.Apparel_PsyfocusShirt.description: A shirt embedded with special magical focusing materials. These enhance magical aptitude and help dissipate arcane load.
LanguageData.Apparel_PsyfocusVest.label: arcanium vest
LanguageData.Apparel_PsyfocusVest.description: A thin vest embedded with special magical focusing materials. These enhance magical aptitude and help dissipate arcane load.
LanguageData.Apparel_PsyfocusRobe.description: A long robe embedded with special magical focusing materials. These enhance magical aptitude and help dissipate arcane load.
LanguageData.Apparel_PsyfocusRobe.label: arcanium robe
